lead_paragraph: University of Richmond center Dan Geriot is expected to miss the coming season after injuring his right knee during summer-league competition in Philadelphia, said Richmond Coach Chris Mooney. Geriot, a 6-foot-9 junior, averaged a team-leading 14.3 points and 5.5 rebounds last season. He will be examined by team doctors, but Mooney said that he believed there was only “a hair of a chance” that he would play this season. Geriot is likely to receive a medical redshirt for the coming season, leaving him with two seasons of eligibility.
